Title: Revenge of the Nerds
Writer: Tim Metcalfe (story), Miguel Tejada-Flores (story), Steve Zacharias (story), Jeff Buhai (story), Steve Zacharias (screenplay), Jeff Buhai (screenplay)
Actors: Robert Carradine, Anthony Edwards, Timothy Busfield, Andrew Cassese
Plot: At Adams College, a group of bullied outcasts and misfits resolve to fight back for their peace and self-respect.
